mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_SEQ_MAIN ( SEQKEY, SEQDESC, CREATEUSER, CREATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{seqkey}, #{seqdesc}, #{createuser}, now() )
INSERT INTO SYS_SEQ_SETTING ( SEQSETTINGID, SEQKEY, SEQTYPE, SEQORDER, SEQTYPEVALUE ) VALUES ( #{seqsettingid}, #{seqkey}, #{seqtype}, #{seqorder}, #{seqtypevalue} )
mapper.select:
SELECT SEQKEY "seqkey", SEQOWNER "seqowner", SEQVALUE "seqvalue", date_format(CREATEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') "createdate" FROM SYS_SEQ_VALUE where SEQKEY=#{seqkey}
AND SEQOWNER=#{seqowner}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_SEQ_VALUE ( SEQKEY, SEQOWNER, SEQVALUE, CREATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{seqkey}, #{seqowner}, 0, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT ( CASE WHEN A.SEQTYPE='1' THEN A.SEQTYPEVALUE WHEN A.SEQTYPE='2' THEN (SELECT date_format(now(),A.SEQTYPEVALUE) FROM DUAL) WHEN A.SEQTYPE='3' THEN (SELECT LPAD(${seqvalue},A.SEQTYPEVALUE,'0') FROM DUAL) END ) "itemValue" FROM SYS_SEQ_SETTING A WHERE A.SEQKEY=#{seqkey} ORDER BY A.SEQORDER ASC
